A comfortable keyboard and mouse are also important for long design sessions.

output.name: GPU
output.price: Varies (Target: RTX 4060 Ti, RX 7700 XT/7800 XT, or RTX 3070)
output.description: Essential for good gaming performance at 1080p and 1440p.

output.name: CPU
output.price: Varies (Target: Intel Core i5-13400(F)/13600K or AMD Ryzen 5 7600(X))
output.description: Provides a good balance of gaming performance and value.

output.name: RAM
output.description: 16GB is recommended for modern games.

output.name: Storage
output.description: A fast SSD is crucial for quick game loading.

output.name: Cooling
output.description: Look for systems with at least two fans or liquid cooling.

additional_notes: Prices for components in prebuilt systems will vary depending on the specific model and manufacturer.  This list provides target specifications to look for when choosing a prebuilt gaming PC under $1500.
